title: Biological Diversity - Chinese saying to emphasize

content.question: The author cites a Chinese saying (last sentence of paragraph 2) to emphasize the

choices.label: contrast between Eastern and Western science
intricacy of the relationships that unite living beings
importance of taxonomy as a field of study

content.answer: importance of taxonomy as a field of study

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
